You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sce;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&scE;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2ab4/index.htm U+02AB4].
  * `&sce;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2ab0/index.htm U+02AB0].
